attributes.action: To free Zimbabwe from Robert Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Nations, European Union, Amnesty International and countless human rights group's have highlighted the suffering in Zimbabwe.

This dictator has raped his own country and persecuted his own people. It's time for the British to do the right thing and remove him from power. Historian's say the greatest gift we gave to the world was a modern democracy and it's our duty (as the mother of all parliaments) to defend the liberty and freedom of the citizens of Zimbabwe.

Please help them Prime Minister.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
